channel.title: Teches on AusculTech Dx
channel.description: Recent content in Teches on AusculTech Dx

item.title: Technology
item.description: AusculTech Dx is a Childrenâ€™s National Hospital spin-off commercializing auscultation-analysis research. What is auscultation? Auscultation is the act (or process) of listening to the heart, lung, and other body sounds using a stethoscope as part of a medical exam. Meet StethAidTM StethAidTM is our digital stethoscope, which along with the mobile app and web dashboard, form our smart digital auscultation platform. Streamlined Care StethAidTM brings intelligent heart murmur identification from specialist offices to primary care offices.
